title: godoc should show platform dependent documentation
body:
Some Go documentation is inevitably platform dependent. For example, in pkg/os, the
Variables section shows variables defined for the Plan 9 port, whereas the Hostname
function points to a Linux-specific source file; pkg/syscall shows a mix of functions
from all different architectures.

It would be great if godoc could show a coherent API, taking into account
platform-specific differences.

Perhaps, for any given page, it could detect if there was some platform dependent
documentation, and provide a selection menu at the top to choose the platform. For a
function or type defined differently across several architectures, the selection menu
might be provided directly at the site of the function documentation.
